88l4Jzd0NAP9VMbK.name: Blazing Conflagration

xQ55sOTkvleyC93p.onSave: creatures take half damage and no ongoing

88l4Jzd0NAP9VMbK.description:
Requirements: A hand free, an oil flask, a flask of alchemist’s fire

You throw the oil and alchemist’s fire together at a square you can see within 30 feet (expending both). They shatter at the same time, splashing blazing liquid everywhere, instantly igniting unattended flammable objects in the affected area. Creatures within 5 feet of the selected square must make a Dexterity save against your Maneuver DC or take 4d6 points of fire damage and suffer 1d6 points of ongoing fire damage which persists for a minute or until an affected creature uses its action to make a DC 14 Dexterity save to extinguish the flames or is doused with at least 1 gallon of water. Creatures that succeed on their initial Dexterity save take half damage and do not suffer ongoing damage.
